name: Offstream
long_description:
Offstream is Vanta for carbon compliance. We have over $350K ARR and 9 customers who are mid-sized clean tech developers. 

Zach (CTO) studied CS at Notre Dame and built the entire product at Repool (YC S21). Varsha (CEO) is an HBS grad who launched a traceable cotton product at Indigo Ag and secured contracts for $50M in booked revenue. At Indigo, she hired 80 people and spent $50M to get carbon compliant because it was opaque, time-consuming, and changing rapidly.

Offstream solves this by using LLMs to parse regulations, generate technical reports for customers, and manage 100,000+ operational data points on projectâ€™s lifecycles. We cut the time customers spend on compliance by 90% and at 1/5th of the cost of alternatives.

All new infrastructure built today has carbon compliance requirements and we are just getting started.
